f(x) = (TotalRaceTime - TimeHeld) * TotalRaceTime

f(x) = (a-b)*a

f(x)

277133813491063 = (40829166 - b) * 40829166

277133813491063 / 40829166 = 40829166 - b 

277133813491063 / 40829166 = 40829166 - b 

6787643.2619530607115511494895585 - 40829166 = -b

-34041522.738046939288448850510442 = -b

b = 34041522.738046939288448850510442


277133813491065

6,787,644 or 34,041,522
34041522 - 6787644 = 27,253,878

940200 = (71530 - b) * 71530
940200 / 71530 = 71530 - b
13.144135327834475045435481616105 - 71530 = -b
-71516.855864672165524954564518384 = -b
b = 71516.855864672165524954564518384


(71530 -71516.855864672165524954564518384 ) * 71530

14 - 71516

71530/2 = 35765

71530

First Time beat distance

(ttlRaceTime - Time Held) * ttlRaceTime 

34041523
